reminiscence.name: Reminiscence Therapy
reminiscence.description: Therapy that involves discussing past experiences, often with photos or other memory triggers

content.prompt: Look at this photo. What memories does it bring back?
content.follow_up: Can you tell me more about that time in your life?

content.question: What was your favorite holiday when you were younger?
content.follow_up: What did you enjoy most about it?

content.description: Listen to music from your youth and discuss memories associated with it
content.prompt: What memories does this song bring back?

reality_orientation.name: Reality Orientation
reality_orientation.description: Therapy focused on improving awareness of time, place, and person

content.prompt: Today is [[day_of_week]], [[month]] [[day]], [[year]]. What season are we in?
We are currently in [[location]]. What city are we in?
Who is the current president of the United States?

cognitive_stimulation.name: Cognitive Stimulation
cognitive_stimulation.description: Activities designed to stimulate thinking, concentration, and memory

content.prompt: How many words can you think of that begin with the letter B?
If you buy an item for $3.45 and pay with $5, how much change should you receive?
Sort these items into their correct categories: apple, car, dog, banana, truck, cat, orange, bus

validation_therapy.name: Validation Therapy
validation_therapy.description: Therapy that focuses on validating feelings rather than correcting factual misperceptions

content.prompt: You seem to be feeling [[emotion]]. Can you tell me more about what you're feeling?
content.follow_up: That sounds difficult. How can I help you feel more comfortable?

content.statement: I can see you miss your [[spouse_name]] very much. Tell me about the times you shared together.

content.prompt: You seem worried about something. What concerns are on your mind right now?
content.approach: Listen without correcting and validate emotions

multisensory_stimulation.name: Multisensory Stimulation
multisensory_stimulation.description: Therapy using sensory experiences (touch, smell, sound, etc.) to stimulate responses

content.prompt: What does this scent remind you of?
Without looking, can you identify this object by touch?
Listen to these sounds and tell me what they are.
